semantic_identifier: [GOLD-186]: issue_clustering v2: Add multilingual normalization + embeddings pipeline for cross-language clustering
title: issue_clustering v2: Add multilingual normalization + embeddings pipeline for cross-language clustering

sections.text: Implement language detection on ingested customer conversations and route text through a multilingual embedding/normalization pipeline so issues reported in different languages can be clustered together. Update clustering inputs to persist detected language, original text, and normalized/translated representation (if used) for auditability and search. Add basic evaluation checks to confirm that semantically equivalent issues across supported languages co-cluster without degrading English-only clustering quality.
